document.title: PLR2, 2025.3 Intel® UEFI Reference Server Firmware Advisory

notes.title: Summary
notes.text: A potential security vulnerability in the UEFI for some Intel® server reference platforms may allow denial of service. Intel is releasing UEFI firmware updates to mitigate this potential vulnerability.

notes.title: Recommendation
notes.text: Intel recommends that users of Intel® Xeon® 6 update to the latest firmware version provided by the system manufacturer that addresses this issue.

cwe.name: Missing Release of Memory after Effective Lifetime

vulnerabilities.title: Missing release of memory after effective lifetime in the UEFI OobRasMmbiHandlerDriver module for some Intel® reference server platforms may allow a privileged user to enable denial of service via local access.
